name: 15Five
title: 15five.com
shortDescription: 15Five is a continuous performance management software designed to enhance employee engagement, performance, and retention. It serves as a strategic command center for HR professionals, enabling them to connect seamlessly with HRIS systems and analyze performance metrics efficiently. An example use case is a company using 15Five to track employee performance quarterly, facilitating better strategic decisions and improving overall company culture.
cons: Potential privacy concerns with extensive data tracking
May require training for optimal use
Dependence on third-party cookies for some functionalities

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: BambooHR
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers comprehensive HR tools with a focus on SMBs

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Workday
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides broader enterprise resource planning features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Lattice
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on performance and career development
